introduction: I am a two-year academic master' student from SEIEE of Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), supervised by Prof. Dong Wang. I received my B.S. degree from the SDCS of Sun Yat-Sen University (SYSU)

news.content: Start to pursue for my Ph.D. degree in NTU.
Finish internship at Local Life Research Institute of Alibaba (Eleme).
Start internship at Local Life Research Institute of Alibaba (Eleme).
Attend SenSys 2019 in New York, USA.
Our paper "FaHo" has been accepted by SenSys 2019.
Our paper "AdaRF" has been accepted by Ubicomp 2019 after a cycle of major revisions.
Our paper "PEC" has been accepted by SECON 2019.
Our paper "PRMS" has been accepted by MSWiM 2018.

project.name: Localization
project.intro: Analyze the features of RFID signals and design robust indoor localization to locate RFID tags accurately. We propose deep learning enhance holography (DLEH) to design adaptive localization model by combing RFID based synthetic aperture radar (SAR) and convolutional neural network (CNN). We also introduce compress sensing algorithms into RFID localization.
